message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price! I think you'll really love it.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but $200 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $120?
I understand you're looking for a better price, but I think $120 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $180. What do you think?
Hi Alice, $180 is still a bit more than I was hoping to spend. How about $140?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! I can do $160, but I'm not sure I can go any lower. What do you think?
